Index.title: Increase Table Revenue with Smart QR Ordering
Index.subtitle: Guests scan a QR, order from their phone, track ETA, and pay in seconds. Faster service. Fewer mistakes. Higher average bills.
Index.trust_line: Setup in under 15 minutes • No app download required
Index.how_it_works_title: How it works in 3 easy steps
Index.step_1_desc: Guests access your digital menu instantly without downloading an app.
Index.step_2_desc: Add or remove items from cart, and select a preferred payment method.
Index.step_3_desc: Guests see a live ETA while your team prepares and serves the order.
Index.features_title: Built for Speed and Premium Experience
Index.features_desc: Everything you need to run a modern, efficient, and highly profitable dining operation.
Index.feature_ai: AI Assistant for Menu Help & Recommendations
Index.testimonial_1_quote: DineQ reduced our order errors by 90%. Guests love the simplicity of the QR menu and real-time tracking.
Index.testimonial_2_quote: The AI assistant is a game changer. It helps guests choose dishes and upsell items automatically.
Index.testimonial_3_quote: Scaling to 10+ tables was a breeze. The owner dashboard gives me control from anywhere.
Index.faq_q1: Do guests need to download an app?
Index.faq_a1: No. DineQ works directly in the mobile browser. Guests just scan the QR code and the menu opens instantly.
Index.faq_q2: Does it support both Cash and Visa?
Index.faq_a2: Yes. You can enable Cash on Delivery, Online Visa payments, or both based on your preference.
Index.faq_q3: How long does it take to set up?
Index.faq_a3: You can be live in less than 24 hours. Just upload your menu, print your QRs, and you're ready to serve.
Index.faq_q4: Can I update my menu in real-time?
Index.faq_a4: Absolutely. You can hide out-of-stock items or change prices instantly from your owner dashboard.
Index.faq_q5: Does it work for food courts and hotels?
Index.faq_a5: Yes, DineQ is optimized for any venue with tables or room service, including beach clubs and hotels.
Index.faq_q6: What if a guest needs help?
Index.faq_a6: The built-in AI assistant can answer questions about the menu, ingredients, and even make recommendations.
Index.cta_final_desc: Join hundreds of restaurants using DineQ to deliver faster, smarter service.
Index.pricing_subtitle: Simple, transparent pricing to help your business grow.
Index.pricing_starter_desc: Perfect for small cafés getting started.
Index.pricing_growth_desc: Best for busy restaurants ready to scale.
Index.showcase_subtitle: A complete, seamless ordering experience built for speed.
Index.showcase_menu_desc: Vibrant, high-speed menu with smart categories. Guests can browse and filter items instantly.
Index.showcase_cart_desc: Add or remove items instantly. Visual feedback ensures no guest ever feels lost.
Index.showcase_eta_desc: Guests know exactly when their food is arriving. Reduces 'where is my order' anxiety.
Index.showcase_checkout_desc: Pay with Cash or Visa directly on the phone. Faster table turnover and higher guest satisfaction.
Index.showcase_ai_desc: Instant help and recommendations. Acts as a digital waiter that knows every ingredient.
Index.business_subtitle: Whether you run a quiet cafe or a busy beach club, DineQ scales with your needs.
Index.partners_subtitle: Join our ecosystem and earn by helping restaurants modernize their service.
Index.demo_trust_quote: "Joined 200+ partners across MENA. From local cafés to premium hotel chains."
Index.demo_subtitle: Experience how DineQ can transform your business.
Index.demo_success_desc: Thank you for your interest. Our team will contact you within 24 hours to schedule your demo.
Index.footer_description: DineQ is a smart QR ordering system built for modern restaurants.
